entry.title: WIND WARNING , Coronation
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coronation 3:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: NW 38 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
